00003 /**
00004  * @brief Database class.
00005  * 
00006  * This class is used to connect to a database.
00007  * 
00008  * @class       Boo_Db
00009  * @license     http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
00010  * @link        http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework
00011  * @copyright   2008 David Singer
00012  * @author      David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
00013  * @version     2.0.1
00014  */
00015 
00016 class Boo_Db {
00017     
00018     /**
00019      * @brief The table name.
00020      */
00021     protected $tableName = 'boo_default';
00022     
00023     /**
00024      * @brief The name of the tables primary key.
00025      */
00026     protected $primaryKey = 'boo_id';
00027     
00028     /**
00029      * @brief Default constructor.
00030      * 
00031      * Handles shorthand object initialization.
00032      * 
00033      * @param string $tableName[optional] The table name.
00034      * @param string $primaryKey[optional] The primary key.
00035      * @return void.
00036      */
00037     public function __construct($tableName = false, $primaryKey = false) {
00038         // set constructor values, using the shorthand form
00039         if ($tableName !== false) {
00040             $this->setTableName($tableName);
00041         }
00042         
00043         if ($primaryKey !== false) {
00044             $this->setPrimaryKey($primaryKey);
00045         }
00046     }
00047     
00048     /**
00049      * @brief Connects to a database.
00050      * 
00051      * This function is used to connect to a database, in this case <a href="http://www.mysql.com/">MySQL 5</a>.
00052      * You will need to set \c BOO_DB_CONNECTION_STRING, \c BOO_DB_USERNAME, and \c BOO_DB_PASSWORD in your config file.
00053      * 
00054      * @return PDO object.
00055      * 
00056      * @code
00057      * $dbh = Boo_Db::connect();
00058      * @endcode
00059      */
00060     static function connect() {
00061         try {
00062             $dbh = new PDO(BOO_DB_CONNECTION_STRING, BOO_DB_USERNAME, BOO_DB_PASSWORD, array(PDO::ATTR_PERSISTENT => true));
00063             $dbh->setAttribute(PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE, PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION);
00064             $dbh->setAttribute(PDO::MYSQL_ATTR_USE_BUFFERED_QUERY, true);
00065         } catch (Exception $e) {
00066             trigger_error($e->getMessage(), E_USER_ERROR);
00067             return false;
00068         }
00069         return $dbh;
00070     }
00071     
00072     /**
00073      * @brief Sets the table name.
00074      * 
00075      * @param string $tableName The table name.
00076      * @return bool Returns TRUE on successs, FALSE otherwise.
00077      * @todo Check if table name exists in database and cache the result.
00078      */
00079     public function setTableName($tableName) {
00080         $tableName = trim($tableName);
00081         
00082         if (Boo_Validator::isSqlSafe($tableName, 1)) {
00083             $this->tableName = $tableName;
00084             return true;
00085         } else {
00086             trigger_error("The string {$tableName} contains illegal characters, SQL injection likely", E_USER_ERROR);
00087             return false;
00088         }
00089     }
00090     
00091     /**
00092      * @brief Gets the table name.
00093      * @return string The table name.
00094      * @since 2.0.0
00095      */
00096     public function getTableName() { return $this->tableName; }
00097     
00098     /**
00099      * @brief Sets the primary key for the table.
00100      * 
00101      * @param string $key The primary key.
00102      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00103      */
00104     public function setPrimaryKey($key) {
00105         $key = trim($key);
00106         
00107         if (!Boo_Validator::isSqlSafe($key)) {
00108             trigger_error("The string {$key} contains illegal characters, SQL injection likely", E_USER_ERROR);
00109             return false;
00110         }
00111         
00112         if ($key) {
00113             $this->primaryKey = $key;
00114             return true;
00115         } else {
00116             return false;
00117         }
00118     }
00119     
00120     /**
00121      * @brief Gets the primary key.
00122      * @return string The primary key.
00123      */
00124     public function getPrimaryKey() { return $this->primaryKey; }
00125 }
